comments:
If you want to run with a JDK1.4, use a JDK 1.4 for the libraries.
The compiler is using the libraries specified on the classpath to compile. If
you put 1.5 libraries on the classpath, we compile using 1.5 libraries.

Closing as INVALID.
This case can be handled using the following option.
Window>Preferences>Java>Compiler>Building>Build path problems>Incommpatible
required binaries>Error/Warnings.

By default this option is set to ignore.

Doing this you would get:Severity	Description	Resource	In Folder	Location
Creation Time

targeting a 1.2 runtime, but is compiled against
'D:jdks/jdk1.5.0_03/jre/lib/charsets.jar' which requires a 1.5 runtime
